body.p: GCC 3.4.4 stabling on x86, Gentoo developers joining Power.org, and 100,000 users registered in the Gentoo Forums are today's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter's main topics. An interview with NASA's supercomputing division, a report from last week's Bangalore FOSS.IN event and one from Germany's Linuxtage, a book review and plenty of statistics, security announcements wrap up this week's slightly belated edition of your newsletter. Enjoy reading the GWN!
